CatDescriptText: General Smith, porter, 754 Bryn Mawr Road, was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 14, 1959, pg. A1 with question: "Do you think Negro business places should have the right to operate in Lower Hill after that section has been beautified?"  Answer reads: "Yes, I think so, because every business should have the right to do so."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of General Smith wearing light colored zippered jacket with collar, moustache, and plaid cap, standing in front of Bud Saunders flower store in Jenkins Arcade, Liberty Avenue, Downtown
